title: Fanciulli Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Fanciulli Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
3 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
3 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
bourbon or
rye
3/4
ounce
sweet vermouth
1/4
ounce
Fernet Branca
Directions
Pour the whiskey, sweet vermouth, and Fernet Branca into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir until outside of mixing glass is very cold to touch, about 15 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass, jigger, strainer, cocktail glass
Whiskey
